mean_en: a political movement that believes in an economic system in which the state controls the means of producing everything on behalf of the people. It aims to create a society in which everyone is treated equally.
sentence: The idea of communism was first introduced by Karl Marx.
sentence_trans: 共产主义思想最初是由卡尔·马克思提出的。
word_etyma: com共同 + mun公共的 + ism……主义 → n.共产主义
